entries.oldman_greeting: %TT, I have an important matter to discuss with you
entries.leave: The mysterious old man rushes off....
entries.military_threaten: I sense the old man has awakened your curiosity, %TT.  I will have that crystal now!
entries.datapad_detail: This appears to contain important data
entries.military_take_crystal: I shall return this crystal to its rightful owner.
entries.read_disk1: The disk contains information about the location of a camp where the soldiers were to report to after completing their assignment.   The disk self-destructs!
entries.read_disk2: The disk contains a location that is on Dathomir.   Along with the location are orders to investigate this planet, specifically, a village south east of the science outpost.   The disk self-destructs!
entries.crystal_message: The Force crystal you have received can be used to open your quest journal.
entries.oldman1_detail: Talk with the old man and find out why he has sought you out.
entries.theater_sum: Investigate the location discovered in the datapad.
entries.goto_dath_sum: Investigate the location mentioned in the datapad on Dathomir.
entries.village_sum: Go to the Village (location discovered in the datapad).  The exact location is Dathomir: 5306 -4145.
entries.dath_woman_sum: Speak with the woman on Dathomir.
entries.oldman2_sum: Talk to the old man again.
entries.oldman2_detail: Talk with the old man and see if he has anything new for you to do.
entries.dath_woman_find_sum: Search for someone that can give you more information.
entries.read_disk_error: You cannot make sense of the information on the disk.
entries.woman_greeting: Hello %TT.  I am so glad I found you. Do you have a moment?
entries.theater_retry: Your waypoint has been updated.  There does not appear to be a camp here.
entries.datapad_failure: This appears to contain data for another planet.  Try using it on a different planet.
entries.datapad_1_sum: Defeat the 2 Sith Shadows that ambushed you and examine them for information on where they came from.
entries.loot_disk1: You must first loot that object before extracting any information out of it.
entries.force_sensitive: You feel a tingle in the Force.
entries.datapad_2_sum: Defeat the Sith and examine them for more information on what they are up to.
